game.name: RGB GlitchGazer
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A mad and romantic ADV. Unravel a strange world of science and philosophy with a mecha girl, zombie girl, or beastfolk. Some paths may disturb you... or thrill you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A mad and romantic ADV. Unravel a strange world of science and philosophy with a mecha girl, zombie girl, or beastfolk. Some paths may disturb you... or thrill you.
